instructions: There are two programs in a high school. Boys are a majority (65%) in program A, and a minority (45%) in program B. There is an equal number of classes in each of the two programs. You enter a class at random, and observe that 55% of the students are boys. What is your best guess—does the class belong to program A or to program B?

items.question: What is your best guess—does the class belong to program A or to program B?
